glsa.title: Syslog-ng: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A Denial of Service vulnerability has been discovered in Syslog-ng.

background.p: Syslog-ng is a flexible and scalable system logger.

description.p: Oriol Carreras reported a NULL pointer dereference in the log_msg_parse() function when processing timestamps without a terminating whitespace character.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted event to a vulnerable Syslog-ng server, resulting in a crash.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Syslog-ng users should upgrade to the latest version:
